Harrison Barnes
To His Excellency
Thos E Bramlette
Gov of Kentucky
Sir

The Grand Jury of Pendleton County at the October Term 1861 found a true bill against the defendant Harrison Barnes for the murder of Joseph Bishop. The accused is a fugitive from justice and I respectfully petition your Excellency to offer a reward for his apprehension

Your obt Servt
S Tho Hauser
P J. P Cty Ct
